name: Chromaclash
description:
A basic game I made to test some different stuff in Unreal Engine. The aim of the game is to reach the portal, changing your colour in order to bypass different barriers.

Use 1,2,3,4 to change your colour at various Painting stations, Enter to restart the level, or Escape to quit the game.

I made all the assets myself as basic 2D sprites so I could just work on collisions and such.
